roleset.name: join together
roleset.note: CONJOIN-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from conjoin.01-v)

example.name: Passive, conjoined as one constituent
example.text: [They]-1 were conjoined *-1 by a common belief in co-operation between the Yishuv and the Palestian Arabs
example.arg: by a common belief in co-operation between the Yishuv and the Palestian Arabs

example.name: Conjoined as separate constituents
example.text: He conjoined dance with gospel to depict his experience of being black in the racist South.
example.arg: to depict his experience of being black in the racist South.
